ValueSet-DVCRelationshipStatus.title: Relationship Status for Contact in Patient Schema
ValueSet-DVCRelationshipStatus.description: JSON Schema for Relationship Status for Contact in Patient ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-DVCRelationshipStatus.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the Relationship Status for Contact in Patient ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust-phw/ValueSet-DVCRelationshipStatus.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
